document_data.name: ''Portable Spring''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''portable spring''''' was a [[magic item]] that originated in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: ''Portable springs'' appeared as blue pieces of cloth.
document_data.Powers: When placed upon the ground, this item became a spring of fresh water, providing up to 200 gallons (760 liters) of fresh water per day. The ''portable spring'' could be picked up and moved easily, reverting back to a piece of blue cloth whenever it was not resting upon the ground.
